unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn and New York City business catalogs collection
abstract_ssm: This collection contains sales catalogs of businesses located in Brooklyn and New York City, including Bellows & Company Wines, E.W. Bliss Company, South Brooklyn Moulding Mill, Abraham & Straus, Dr. Jaeger's Sanitary Woolen System Company, and the Bedell Company.
